document.full_text: luke donald is the third player this year, after lee westwood (twice) and martin kaymer, to be ranked no. 1 since tiger woods relinquished the spot to westwood in november 2010.
document.title: tossing no. 1 ranking in bag, donald sets out after another top-10 finish
lines_and_colors: luke donald is the third player this year, after lee westwood (twice) and martin kaymer, to be ranked no. 1 since tiger woods relinquished the spot to westwood in november 2010.
